metadata.title: CVE-2018-10115 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect initialization logic of RAR decoder objects in 7-Zip 18.03 andbefore can lead to usage of uninitialized memory, allowing remote attackersto cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) or execute arbitrary codevia a crafted RAR archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

p7zip-rar - 16.02-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: p7zip-rar package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '16.02-3').
